# RecentlyPlayedMusicItem

**Enumeration**

An item that represents an album, a playlist, or a station that the user has recently played.

## Declaration

```swift
enum RecentlyPlayedMusicItem
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **RecentlyPlayedMusicItem.album(_:)**: An item that corresponds to an album.
- **RecentlyPlayedMusicItem.playlist(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a playlist.
- **RecentlyPlayedMusicItem.station(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a station.

## Instance Properties

- **artwork**: The artwork of this item.
- **id**: The unique identifier of this item.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play this item.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle of this item.
- **title**: The title of this item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicItem
- MusicRecentlyPlayedRequestable
- PlayableMusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
